name: Kops - Keystone Kapers Remix
description:
Arrow keys - move

control - jump

 I remember the escalator being a challenge 150 years ago when I made this. I'm going to go in and clean the game up to make it more presentable soon. The minimap is broke for some reason, should be easy to fix. I always imagined a cop knocking everything over chasing the crook, so he knocks everything off the shelves as you go :D It's fun.
